snippet.title: Steam The Legend of Heroes: Kai no Kiseki -Farewell, O Zemuria- Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The Legend of Heroes: Kai no Kiseki - Farewell, O Zemuria - is coming to Steam®!

Steam®Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3319980

･ With DirectX 12 and XeSS/DLSS/FSR, enjoy high-quality visuals and high frame rates
･ Compatible with ultra-wide monitors (21:9) and Steam Deck (16:10)
･ In addition to Traditional Chinese and Korean, now available in Simplified Chinese, as well!


Title: The Legend of Heroes: Kai no Kiseki -Farewell, O Zemuria-
Genre: Story-based RPG
Console: Steam®
Release Date: January 23, 2025 (scheduled)
Languages
　Audio: Japanese
　Subtitles: Traditional Chinese / Korean / Simplified Chinese
Steam®Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3319980

©2024-2025 Nihon Falcom Corporation. All rights reserved.
Licensed to and published by Clouded Leopard Entertainment Inc.
